title: Hair styles that wowed at the Oscars
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Hair styles that wowed at the Oscars Sofia Carson channels pure sophistication with an updo and embellished clip, which perfectly paired with her Monique Lhuillier gown. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Hair styles that wowed at the Oscars None Sofia Carson channels pure sophistication with an updo and embellished clip, which perfectly paired with her Monique Lhuillier gown. Paul Buck, EPA Ruth Negga’s headband is flawless. Richard Shotwell, Invision/AP Felicity Jones was the belle of the Oscars ball with this dreamy hairstyle. Paul Buck, EPA Emma Roberts' red hair and old Hollywood glam lit up the Oscars. Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK Kirsten Dunst married her regal attire with unstructured, rocker hair. We are loving the contrast. Jeff Kravitz, FilmMagic Taraji P. Henson oozes sex appeal with her romantic locks. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY NETWORK None Jessica Biel's middle part is everything: simple and sleek. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY NETWORK None Octavia Spencer let the long bob do all the talking on the red carpet. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY NETWORK None Janelle Monáe's gold headband adds an ethereal look to her fairytale moment. Dan MacMedan, Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK None Michelle Williams sported a sharp, platinum blonde pixie cut. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY NETWORK Like this topic?
